label: 藤原敦宗
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (1042-1111). Nephew of Sanetsuna. Cousin of Arinobu. President of the court university, erudite" of literature, and tutor to the Crown Prince. Kanshi in Honchō mudaishi 本朝無題詩 (4), Chūyū ki burui shihai kanshishū 中右記部類紙背漢詩集 (3), Shinsen rōeishū 新撰朗詠集 (3), and Wakan kensakushu (3). Prose compositions in Honchō zoku monzui 本朝続文粋 (7) and Choya gunsai.　[実綱、有信、漢詩、和漢兼作集、朝野群載] "
